title: John Fitzgerald Kennedy National Historic Site: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping         Cooldige Corner at night Brookline.com  Eating Nearby Coolidge Corner offers a wide variety of dining options. For a full list provided by the Brookline Chamber of Commerce, please click here. Sleeping There are several places to stay in Brookline. Click here for a list provided by the Brookline Chamber of Commerce. The site is also easily accessible from Boston, which offers many hotel choices.
